name: Claude
purpose: Advanced AI assistant for analysis, automation, and MCP connector integration
description: Advanced AI language model with 200K+ token context window. Used for deep analysis, research synthesis, knowledge assistance, and as the core AI for MCP (Model Context Protocol) connector automation. Enables no-code connector generation via mcp-builder skill and powers automated workflows for email, calendar, and CRM integration.
skill_level_required: Beginner to Advanced (depending on use case)
cost_structure: API-based (usage pricing), Subscription for Pro features

workflows: Deep company research (parallel with Gemini, Perplexity)
Call transcription analysis (extract action items, summaries)

steps: Enable Claude Skills in Desktop App
Claude generates complete MCP server code

limitations: Some connectors need API credentials setup
recommended_model: Sonnet 4.5 for code generation and tool calling

name: Claude Desktop App
purpose: Local desktop application for Claude AI with MCP connector support
description: Desktop application interface for Claude AI that enables running custom local MCP (Model Context Protocol) connectors. Provides full read/write/send access to connected applications like Gmail, Google Calendar, CRM, and custom services. Supports the MCP Builder skill for generating connectors with simple two-sentence prompts.
cost_structure: Free application, requires Claude API subscription

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: AI Automation Platform with Custom App Connectors
use_cases: stack multiple connectors for complex workflows
workflows: Automated Morning Email Drafting (30-60 min saved/day)
Newsletter Subscriber Auto-Reply (20-25 emails every 3-5 days)
Stacked Connector Automation: Post-Meeting Workflow (15 hours/week saved)
Simple Setup Process for Local Connectors (5 min deployment)

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Enable Claude Skills and MCP Support
steps: Enable Claude Skills feature in settings
Claude drafts responses based on context

strengths: Stacked connector capability for complex automation
Works with any application via MCP
limitations: Some connectors need Google Cloud credentials
Requires Sonnet 4.5 model for best results

name: Claude Projects
purpose: Organize AI workflows with custom knowledge, instructions, and team collaboration
description: Claude Projects is a feature within Claude that allows users to create dedicated workspaces with custom knowledge bases, specific instructions, and conversation history. Each project can have up to 200,000 tokens of context (knowledge docs, style guides, code repos), custom instructions for behavior, and shared team access. Used for organizing complex workflows, maintaining context across sessions, and collaborating on AI-assisted tasks with consistent behavior.
cost_structure: Included with Claude Pro subscription ($20/month) and Team plans

use_cases: maintain custom knowledge base per project
collaborate on AI tasks with team

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Extract Meeting Insights with Claude Projects
steps: Upload knowledge docs (meeting formats, action item templates)
Set custom instructions (extract action items, format as markdown)
Ask Claude to extract insights following project instructions
Claude uses project context to format consistently
Share project with team for collaboration
typical_workflow_pattern.time_estimate: 5-10 minutes for setup, 2-3 minutes per transcript analysis
typical_workflow_pattern.time_saved: 30+ minutes per meeting (vs manual note-taking and formatting)

limitations: Requires Claude Pro or Team subscription

key_features.custom_knowledge: Upload docs, style guides, code repos (up to 200K tokens)
key_features.custom_instructions: Define AI behavior, output format, role

use_case_examples.description: Create project with meeting format templates, upload transcripts, extract action items with consistent formatting
Upload code style guide, set instructions for coding standards, generate code following project conventions
Upload brand guidelines, tone of voice docs, generate content matching brand style

recommended_for: Organizing complex AI workflows, maintaining project context, and team collaboration on AI tasks

name: Gemini
purpose: Large dataset processing, LinkedIn account analysis, deep company research
description: Google's AI model optimized for processing large datasets. Used for LinkedIn message history analysis (2,000+ accounts) and deep company research.
cost_structure: Free tier (3-month promo: $120 value → $80) + paid plans

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Large Dataset Analysis & LinkedIn History Processing
workflows: LinkedIn Analysis: Export 2,000+ accounts → Gemini processes → Pattern identification → Template optimization
Deep Research (n8n): Branch A - Gemini analyzes company website → Company size, industry, tech stack → 2-3 min automated
Lead Enrichment: Company data → Gemini processing → Structured output → CRM population

name: MCP Builder (Skill)
category: AI Tools / Claude Skill / Code Generation
purpose: Automatically generate MCP connector code from simple prompts
description: Claude skill that auto-generates Model Context Protocol (MCP) server code for connecting Claude to any application. Takes a two-sentence prompt describing the desired connector and generates complete, working MCP server code with full read/write/send capabilities. Eliminates need for manual coding of connectors.
cost_structure: Included with Claude subscription (part of Claude Skills)
integration_capabilities: Creates connectors for any application with API
Full CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)

use_cases: generate Gmail connector with full access
connect Claude to custom internal tools
workflows: Create Custom Application Connector (two-sentence prompt → full MCP server)
Simple Setup Process for Local Connectors (5 minutes total)

steps: Enable mcp-builder skill in Claude Desktop
Write 2-sentence prompt: 'I want to connect to [App]. I need [capabilities]'
mcp-builder generates complete MCP server code
Deploy connector locally with Cursor assistance
Prompt: 'Connect Claude to Gmail with read, write, and send access'
Code includes OAuth, email reading, drafting, sending

strengths: Faster than manual development (5-10 min vs hours)
Works with any application that has an API
limitations: Some connectors need API credentials setup
Learning curve for first-time MCP setup
example_prompts: I want to connect Claude to Gmail with full read, write, and send access
Create a Google Calendar connector that can read, create, and delete events
Connect Claude to my CRM (Airtable) to update client records automatically

code_generation_capabilities.output: Complete MCP server ready to deploy

name: OpenAI GPT-5
purpose: AI model for parsing unstructured HTML and extracting structured contact data
description: Large language model used in lead generation workflows for parsing unstructured website HTML and extracting structured contact information. Integrated via n8n workflows to process scraped website data and identify emails, names, titles, and company info from raw HTML.

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: AI-Powered HTML Parsing for Lead Extraction
use_cases: parse unstructured HTML for contact data
workflows: AI Website Content Extraction (n8n + OpenAI + Apify → Anymailfinder → 10-20% enrichment)

success_rate: 10-20% email enrichment (lower but handles difficult sources)

name: Sonnet 4.5
purpose: Advanced Claude model recommended for code generation and tool calling
description: Claude's most advanced model specifically recommended for MCP connector code generation and tool calling workflows. Provides superior performance for technical tasks like generating MCP server code via mcp-builder skill.
cost_structure: Higher API cost than other Claude models

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Recommended Model for MCP Connector Generation

name: n8n
purpose: No-code/low-code platform for building automated workflows and integrations
description: Open-source workflow automation tool that connects apps and services. Enables building complex automated workflows using a visual node-based editor. Supports HTTP requests, API integrations, data parsing, and connecting multiple tools/services. Used extensively in lead generation for scraping, data processing, and multi-step enrichment pipelines.
cost_structure: Free self-hosted, Cloud pricing starts at $20/month

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Lead Generation Workflow Automation and Custom Scraping
use_cases: connect scraping tools to enrichment services
automate HTTP requests to custom platforms
workflows: Custom Niche Platform Scraping (n8n + HTTP + Anymailfinder → 11.5% reply rate)
AI Website Content Extraction (n8n + OpenAI + Apify → structured contact data)

steps: Build HTTP Request workflow in n8n
Send requests to platform listing pages
Trigger Apify scraper for website data
Send HTML to OpenAI GPT-5 via n8n
Extract structured contact data (emails, names, titles)
Feed to Anymailfinder for email enrichment

strengths: Enables 3-4x higher reply rates with custom scraping
limitations: Steep learning curve for complex workflows
Requires coding knowledge for advanced scraping
Not as user-friendly as Zapier for beginners
best_for: Custom scraping and complex multi-step workflows

name: Vayne
purpose: Scrape lead lists from LinkedIn Sales Navigator search URLs
description: LinkedIn scraping tool specifically designed for extracting lead data from LinkedIn Sales Navigator searches. Takes a Sales Navigator search URL and exports the results to CSV format with profile information. Essential component in the highest-performing lead generation workflow (80-100% email enrichment when combined with Sales Navigator and Anymailfinder).

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: LinkedIn Sales Navigator Lead List Export
use_cases: export LinkedIn Sales Navigator search results
workflows: LinkedIn Sales Navigator Lead Extraction (Navigator → Vayne → Anymailfinder → 80-100% enrichment)

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Export LinkedIn Leads with Email Enrichment
steps: Create targeted search in LinkedIn Sales Navigator
Download CSV with profile data (name, title, company, LinkedIn URL)

strengths: Fast bulk scraping (1,000+ leads in minutes)
Works directly with Sales Navigator URLs
Essential for highest-performing lead gen workflow
No complex setup after initial configuration
limitations: LinkedIn may detect and flag excessive scraping
Scraping rate limits to avoid detection

authentication_requirements.how_to_obtain: Extract from browser after LinkedIn login

success_metrics.comparison: #1 highest enrichment rate among all methods

workflow_position: Middle step in 3-part workflow: Sales Navigator → Vayne → Anymailfinder
compliance_note: Users should review LinkedIn Terms of Service regarding automated scraping
recommended_workflow: Sales Navigator search → Vayne export → Anymailfinder enrichment

name: Discord
purpose: Team communication and collaboration platform for text, voice, and video channels
description: Discord is a communication platform designed for creating communities through organized text channels, voice calls, and video meetings. Features include threaded conversations, screen sharing, file sharing, role-based permissions, bots for automation, and integration with third-party tools. Used for team communication, project collaboration, community building, and real-time coordination.
cost_structure: Free tier available, Nitro subscription $9.99/month, Server Boost from $4.99/month

workflows: Design review sessions with screen sharing

steps: Set up channels by topic (general, projects, support, etc.)
Set up bots for automation (notifications, moderation)
typical_workflow_pattern.time_saved: Reduces email clutter, enables instant communication

strengths: Easy to set up and use
limitations: Can be overwhelming with many channels
Search functionality limited in free tier
File upload size limited (8MB free, 500MB with Nitro)
Message history limited in some cases
Not designed for formal business communication
recommended_for: Real-time team communication, community building, and collaborative projects

name: Apify
purpose: Platform hosting pre-built web scrapers (Actors) for various sites and data sources
description: Cloud-based web scraping and automation platform that hosts hundreds of pre-built scrapers called 'Actors'. Provides ready-to-use scrapers for Google SERP, Google Maps, LinkedIn Jobs, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, and many other platforms. Used extensively in lead generation workflows for extracting contact data from multiple sources with varying enrichment success rates (20-100% depending on source).
cost_structure: Credit-based pricing, free tier available, paid plans from $49/month

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Multi-Platform Web Scraping for Lead Generation
use_cases: scrape Google search results for domains
scrape LinkedIn Jobs for intent-based leads
workflows: Social Media Scraping (Apify Instagram/TikTok → Anymailfinder → 20-40% enrichment)
AI Website Content Extraction (Apify → n8n → OpenAI → Anymailfinder)

steps: Define search queries (e.g., 'AI agencies in California')
Run scraper to extract domains from results
Import to Anymailfinder for email enrichment
Search LinkedIn Jobs for relevant positions (e.g., 'hiring SDR')
Scrape company domains and job posters

integration_with_other_tools: OpenAI GPT-5 (AI parsing for unstructured data)

limitations: Credit costs can add up for large volumes
Some scrapers may break when sites change

name: Apify LinkedIn Jobs Scraper
purpose: Scrape LinkedIn Jobs to identify intent-based leads and hiring companies
description: Pre-built Apify Actor that scrapes LinkedIn job postings to identify companies actively hiring for specific roles. Provides intent-based lead generation by targeting companies with hiring needs. When combined with Anymailfinder, achieves 80-100% email enrichment success rate - matching LinkedIn Sales Navigator performance. Highly effective for B2B sales targeting companies with specific hiring signals.
cost_structure: Apify credit-based (part of Apify platform subscription)

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Intent-Based Lead Generation via Hiring Signals
use_cases: identify companies hiring for specific roles
target companies with hiring intent signals
build warm lead lists based on job postings
time sales outreach to hiring cycles
workflows: LinkedIn Jobs Intent-Based Lead Gen (Apify Jobs → Anymailfinder → 80-100% enrichment)

steps: Search LinkedIn Jobs for relevant positions (e.g., 'hiring SDR')
Extract: company domains, job poster info, hiring signals
Achieve 80-100% email enrichment (highest for Apify methods)
Target outreach to companies with active hiring intent

success_rate: 80-100% email enrichment (highest for Apify, matches Sales Navigator)
intent_signal: Active hiring = warm lead with immediate need
enrichment_rank: #1 for Apify methods (tied with Sales Navigator workflow)

name: Claude Code
purpose: AI-powered code editor extension for intelligent coding assistance and MCP connector deployment
description: Claude Code (also known as Cursor with Claude integration) is an AI-powered coding assistant that provides intelligent code completion, debugging assistance, code explanation, and deployment guidance. Built on VS Code architecture, it integrates Claude's advanced reasoning capabilities directly into the development workflow. Used for writing code, deploying MCP connectors, troubleshooting issues, and guiding developers through technical setup with AI-assisted explanations.
skill_level_required: Beginner to Advanced (AI assistance lowers barrier for complex tasks)
platform_compatibility: Works as VS Code extension or standalone app
integration_capabilities: Claude AI integration for code assistance

use_cases: explain complex code in plain language
generate code from natural language descriptions
workflows: Code development with AI pair programming

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Deploy MCP Connector with Claude Code (SKL-071)
steps: Generate MCP connector code via Claude Projects (mcp-builder)
Copy generated code to local directory
Ask Claude to explain deployment steps
Claude Code guides through: dependencies, config files, OAuth setup
Test connector locally with AI assistance
Add connector to Claude Desktop settings
Debug any issues with AI troubleshooting
typical_workflow_pattern.complexity: Medium (AI makes it accessible to non-developers)
typical_workflow_pattern.without_ai: 20-30 minutes for non-developers, 10-15 min for developers

steps: Describe what you want to build in natural language
Claude Code generates initial code structure
Review and refine with AI suggestions
typical_workflow_pattern.time_estimate: Varies by project, typically 30-50% faster than traditional coding

strengths: Makes technical tasks accessible to non-developers
Built on VS Code (familiar interface, extensive extensions)
Explains technical concepts in plain language
limitations: Still requires basic technical understanding for complex tasks
Internet connection required for AI features
May generate code that needs review

time_savings_metrics.mcp_deployment: 5-15 minutes with Claude Code vs 20-30 minutes without
time_savings_metrics.learning_curve: Reduces onboarding time for new tools by 60%

accessibility_benefit: Enables non-developers to deploy MCP connectors and perform technical tasks through AI guidance

skill_requirements.for_general_coding: Beginner to Advanced (AI adapts to skill level)

recommended_for: MCP connector deployment, AI-assisted development, and making technical tasks accessible to non-developers
note: Claude Code may refer to either the VS Code extension or Cursor editor with Claude integration. Both provide similar AI-assisted coding capabilities.

name: Cursor
purpose: AI-powered code editor for assisting with local MCP connector setup and deployment
description: AI-enhanced code editor built on VS Code that provides intelligent code assistance, debugging, and deployment guidance. Used in the MCP connector workflow to help deploy locally-generated connector code, configure settings, and troubleshoot issues. Makes MCP connector deployment accessible to non-developers through AI-guided setup.
skill_level_required: Beginner to Intermediate (AI assistance lowers barrier)

workflows: Simple Setup Process for Local Connectors (Cursor assists deployment in 5 minutes)

typical_workflow_pattern.task: Deploy MCP Connector with AI Assistance
steps: Generate MCP connector code via mcp-builder
Ask Cursor to explain setup steps
Cursor guides through: dependencies, config files, OAuth setup

strengths: Makes MCP deployment accessible to non-developers
Reduces deployment time: 5 min vs 20-30 min
Explains technical concepts in plain language

time_savings_metrics.mcp_deployment: 5 minutes with Cursor vs 20-30 min without

accessibility_benefit: Enables non-developers to deploy MCP connectors through AI guidance
recommended_for: MCP connector deployment and local development

name: Google Cloud Console
purpose: Configure OAuth credentials for Gmail and Calendar MCP connectors
description: Google's cloud platform console used to create OAuth 2.0 credentials required for Gmail and Google Calendar MCP connectors. Essential setup step for Google-based MCP integrations.

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: OAuth Credential Setup for MCP Connectors

name: MCP (Model Context Protocol)
purpose: Protocol standard for connecting AI models to external applications
description: Model Context Protocol - the underlying technology/standard that enables Claude to connect to external applications via locally-running server connectors. Acts as a bridge between Claude AI and any application with an API. Generated automatically by mcp-builder skill, deployed locally for privacy and security.

workflows: All MCP connector workflows (Gmail, Calendar, CRM)
